Uses of Interface
io.hekate.cluster.ClusterNodeFilter

  • Packages that use ClusterNodeFilter 
    Package Description
    io.hekate.cluster
    ClusterService API.
    io.hekate.messaging
    MessagingService API.
    io.hekate.messaging.loadbalance
    Load balancer API.

    • Uses of ClusterNodeFilter in io.hekate.cluster

      Methods in io.hekate.cluster with parameters of type ClusterNodeFilter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default T ClusterFilterSupport.filter(ClusterNodeFilter filter)
      Returns a copy of this instance that will use the specified filter along with all the filter criteria that were inherited from this instance.
      ClusterTopology ClusterTopology.filter(ClusterNodeFilter filter)
      Returns a copy of this topology containing only those nodes that match the specified filter.
      static ClusterFilter ClusterFilters.forFilter(ClusterNodeFilter filter)
      Wraps the specified filter with ClusterFilter.

    • Uses of ClusterNodeFilter in io.hekate.messaging

      Methods in io.hekate.messaging that return ClusterNodeFilter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClusterNodeFilter MessagingChannelConfig.getClusterFilter()
      Returns the cluster node filter for this channel (see MessagingChannelConfig.setClusterFilter(ClusterNodeFilter)).
      Methods in io.hekate.messaging with parameters of type ClusterNodeFilter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void MessagingChannelConfig.setClusterFilter(ClusterNodeFilter clusterFilter)
      Sets the cluster node filter that should be used to filter nodes during the the message sending.
      MessagingChannelConfig<T> MessagingChannelConfig.withClusterFilter(ClusterNodeFilter clusterFilter)
      Fluent-style version of MessagingChannelConfig.setClusterFilter(ClusterNodeFilter).

    • Uses of ClusterNodeFilter in io.hekate.messaging.loadbalance

      Methods in io.hekate.messaging.loadbalance with parameters of type ClusterNodeFilter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LoadBalancerContext LoadBalancerContext.filter(ClusterNodeFilter filter)
